授業方法:
Face-to-face. Students will participate in daily discussion activities, make presentations, read extensively, and use English in communicative tasks.

During the infection priority period, most classes will be held on Zoom. Students should join the Zoom session during the scheduled class time. Some classes might be on campus face-to-face. The instructor will notify at least one week in advance whether class will be online or in person.

*This course will be held on campus as a face-to-face lesson. However, if any students for this class have been granted permission to take classes online in 2021 due to health conditions, course materials and on-demand broadcast of data recorded from face-to-face classes will be made available on LUNA.
